entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.10.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Chore: migrate dashboard-icons by @walkxcode in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4564
  • Fix: fix bing search logo by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4571

New Contributors

  • @walkxcode made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4564

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.10.8...v0.10.9

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.0.0
entry.content:
Homepage v1.0! üéâ

We're excited to announce the release of homepage v1.0! This release contains a bunch of new widgets, fixes and other improvements, but if you're curious why the major version bump, it's because of the breaking changes included:

  • [BREAKING] Enhancement: require host validation by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4744
    • This change is for security reasons and the update is simple: users will need to set the HOMEPAGE_ALLOWED_HOSTS environment variable (how to do that varies by install type, see the docs)
  • [BREAKING] Chore: update to next v15 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4661
    • homepage no longer runs on armv7 (RIP ‚úåÔ∏è)
  • [BREAKING] Chore: upgrade to tailwind v4 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4863
    • some users may need to update their custom css
  • [BREAKING] Enhancement: support for Kubernetes gateway API by @djeinstine in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4643
    • k8s users may need to update their configuration, see https://gethomepage.dev/configs/kubernetes/

Thank you to our community of contributors, discord chat helpers and our users! We are so proud of the collaboration that goes into keeping this project delightful.

What's Changed

  • Documentation: add note about clearing UniFi cache non-docker by @GTez in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4585
  • Enhancement: handle evcc breaking change by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4630
  • Development: pnpm lint on ci by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4646
  • Fix: fix overlap with glances charts in multi-widgets by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4653
  • [BREAKING] Chore: update to next v15 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4661
  • Feature: Firefly widget by @Amjad50 in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4683
  • Fix: correct package version number by @Maarc in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4691
  • Enhancement: support speedtest v1.2 API by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4695
  • Enhancement: filter prometheus API endpoint for active only by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4701
  • Fix: fix nesting with unsorted groups by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4711
  • Enhancement: use datasets for truenas pools by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4716
  • Chore: upgrade kubernetes/client-node by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4715
  • Fix: Timezone-aware Date comparison for Calendar integration by @Yeraze in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4742
  • [BREAKING] Enhancement: support for Kubernetes gateway API by @djeinstine in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4643
  • [BREAKING] Enhancement: require host validation by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4744
  • Enhancement: better tz parsing of ical recurring events by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4749
  • Fix: handle possible null reference in k8s gateway api by @dudo in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4752
  • Fixhancement: add an option to fritzbox widget to display IPv6 by @astappiev in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4778
  • Enhancement: improve try to prune trailing slashes by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4783
  • Enhancement: support API key for Kavita by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4784
  • Chore(deps): Bump jsonpath-plus from 10.2.0 to 10.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4794
  • Chore: another big deps update by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4795
  • Documentation: add auth documentation to PeaNUT by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4803
  • Enhancement: better handle recurring events poorly handled by ical library by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4807
  • Chore(deps): Bump docker/setup-qemu-action from 3.4.0 to 3.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4836
  • Fix: subtract inactive_file from glances container memory usage by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4844
  • Documentation: remove auth info from romm widget by @gantoine in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4846
  • Chore(deps): Bump docker/setup-qemu-action from 3.5.0 to 3.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4848
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-config-prettier from 9.1.0 to 10.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4856
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump prettier from 3.5.1 to 3.5.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4859
  • Enhancement: support new unifi network api and api key by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4860
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint from 9.20.1 to 9.21.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4858
  • Chore(deps): Bump tough-cookie from 4.1.4 to 5.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4857
  • Feature: Add APC UPS widget by @nicupavel in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4840
  • [BREAKING] Chore: upgrade to tailwind v4 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4863
  • Fix: return all http routes of a namespace (k8s) by @arthur-leclerc in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4865
  • Fix: correct omada widget connectedGateways by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4872
  • Enhancement: support komga API keys, breaking API changes by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4874
  • Fix: use 'real_usage' for synology diskstation memory stats by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4880
  • Fix: fix k8s get nodes error log by @jnodorp in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4887
  • Enhancement: support automatic service discovery services with layout-only nesting by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4900
  • Chore: add plex container size to requests by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4903
  • Chore: migrate to pnpm only by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4907
  • Feature: Hoarder service widget by @vhsdream in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4913
  • Enhancement: cache release data, allow disable release checking by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4917
  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4599

New Contributors

  • @GTez made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4585
  • @Amjad50 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4683
  • @Maarc made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4691
  • @Yeraze made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4742
  • @djeinstine made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4643
  • @dudo made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4752
  • @astappiev made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4778
  • @nicupavel made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4840
  • @arthur-leclerc made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4865
  • @jnodorp made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4887

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.10.9...v1.0.0

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.0.2
entry.content:
This small bug fix fixes a couple of layout issues in v1.0.0 and reverts a change to networking that was in v1.0.1

Please also check out the v1.0 release notes

  • Fix: fix plex total size with larger libraries by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4933
  • Fix: fix larger breakpoint by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4935

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.2

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: wrapping in bookmarks by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4945
  • Fix: fix kavita API body with key by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4948
  • Fix: correct units for speedtest tracker API v2 by @brikim in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4950
  • Change: prefer IPv4 in docker image by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4954
  • Enhancement: allow disabling host checking by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4967
  • Fix: jellyfin handle empty episode numbers by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4970
  • Documentation: add HOMEPAGE_ALLOWED_HOSTS to k8s docs by @xalxnder in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4969

New Contributors

  • @xalxnder made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4969

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Chore: update minecraftstatuspinger to 1.2.2 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4982
  • Fix: fix Kubernetes stats in v1.0.0 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4984
  • Change: re-enable k8s ingress by default by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4988
  • Fix: fix bookmark heights again by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4997
  • Fix: re-add tailwind css safelist by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4999
  • Fix: fix custom quicklaunch search suggestions without search widget by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5003

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4
